title: INDIC FONTS
content:
THIS FORUM WILL SPECIALISE IN THE PROBLEMS OF iNDIC FONTS.  
INDIAN SCRIPTS ARE COMPLEX AND THE COMPLEXITY IS FURTHER ENHANCED BY THE FACT THAT THERE ARE NO FIXED STANDARDS FOR DISPLAYING CONJUNCT SHAPES AS WELL AS LIGATURES.  
MOREOVER THE FORUM WILL ALLOW FONTOGRAPHERS AND CALLIGRAPHERS TO PUT UP LINKS TO THEIR SITES FOR STUDYING FONTS WHICH THEY HAVE DESIGNED.  
FINALLY UNICODE AND OPEN TYPE FONT DESIGN WHICH ARE CLOSELY TIED UP WILL ALSO BE STUDIED
author: boromir
